metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10913 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An information disclosure vulnerability was discovered in glusterfs server. An attacker could issue a xattr request via glusterfs FUSE to determine the existence of any file. It was discovered that GlusterFS incorrectly handled FUSE requests. An attacker could use this issue to obtain sensitive information.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-10913` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

glusterfs-client - 4.1.4-1
glusterfs-common - 4.1.4-1
glusterfs-server - 4.1.4-1
libgfapi0 - 4.1.4-1
libgfchangelog0 - 4.1.4-1
libgfrpc0 - 4.1.4-1
libgfxdr0 - 4.1.4-1
libglusterd0 - 4.1.4-1
libglusterfs0 - 4.1.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glusterfs package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.4-1').
